text:
We have an application developed using Java-ADF Technology as the front end application and Oracle "Content DataBase" as backend.

The Login authentication ,is been done by "SSO" server.

We have added the Config element as:"HTTP Authorization Manager" and 
sampler as:"HTTP Request" 

and Listener as:View Results Tree.

but when ever we Run the "Test Plan" ,its showing Error message in "Sample Result" as given below

Sample Start: 2009-05-28 11:32:09 IST
Load time: 6770
Latency: 0
Size in bytes: 0
Sample Count: 1
Error Count: 1
Response code: 401
Response message: Unauthorized

Response headers:
HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized
Date: Thu, 28 May 2009 05:17:19 GMT
Server: Oracle-Application-Server-10g/10.1.2.0.2 Oracle-HTTP-Server
Cache-Control: private
WWW-Authenticate: BASIC realm="Single Sign-On"
Keep-Alive: timeout=15, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
creator: scatish_apps@yahoo.com
scatish_apps@yahoo.com
text: Actually the Application Back-end is Oracle DB.
